name: Snezhana Paderina
bio:

Fashion+Tech | CG | UE5 | Parsons

social_posts.post_text:
Last week, our journey took us to Ankara, Türkiye, where we met with the official distributor of cutting-edge mocap equipment.

We had the chance to explore the most advanced mocap animation tools firsthand. @facewaretech Faceware Mark IV wireless headcam system was impressive with its ability to capture detailed facial animations, and with the Manus Xsens Metagloves @manusmeta , we recorded precise hand gestures (such a dream to never animate Metahuman fingers by hand ever again😁).

This hands-on experience with advanced technology has further fueled my commitment to advance in the field of 3D cinematics and digital fashion. 
Thank you, @sense4motion for such an insightful and inspiring journey!

@movellaent #motioncapture #mocap #gamedevstudio #facecap #movella #xsence #cinematic  #unrealengine #ue5

Digital clothing for UE developers studio Dec+Art Games (Los Angeles)

Can’t wait to share one of our last projects! I, along with my team, created digital clothes for the @decartgames project - a thrilling cinematic for a zombie-apocalypse game. We developed digital clothes for the main character and zombie characters under the careful guidance of the studio’s art director @pavel_fetisov_fint and producer @mr_lebovskii. It was important for the team to convey the game’s genre, stylized details, and to intrigue the audience. The cinematics were created using Unreal Engine and the technology used for the character animation is mocap animation, so we considered the specifics of the game engine, and later on, the clothes were optimized by dec+art games studio for use with Metahuman.

More than 15 skilled specialists worked on the project:
Art Director: @pavel_fetisov_fint
Producer: @mrlebovskii
Sound: @warnerbrosentertainment
Director and screenwriter: @ilseverov
Character animation: @artur__kudryavtsev
CG Artist:  @artur__kudryavtsev @krisxiis @kmamax @mishagospodarec @nikolayputintsev_dev
Technical Director / Level Artist: @nikolayputintsev_dev
Clothes Design: @snezhananyc @krisxiis
Clothes Simulation: @krisxiis @kmamax
Lighting Artist: @mishagospodarec @krisxiis 
Post Processing: @vd_mtnv @ssingaevsky
MoCap: @mr_lebovskii
Texturing: @den.poh
Colorist: @matvey.bunaev 
@epicgames @unrealengine @movellaent #3d #cg #unrealengine #lumen #realtimerendering #ue5 #maya #animation #3danimation #film #cinematic #game

AI art 👾✨

Artificial intelligence brings a whole new dimension to an artist's creative process. It allows us to study and explore high-level concepts and try form, color, and composition combinations. It is not a substitute for creativity; rather, it magnifies and expands it. In the future, AI art will give rise to new roles, collaborations, and innovative thinking methods.

It seems like it was just recently when I shared my initial works with AI here. However, the "intelligence" of neural networks has since evolved significantly in just six months to a year. Now the topic of generating art and photos using AI is increasingly causing polarized opinions and discussions. To me, neural networks have evolved into a crucial tool for team communication, client interaction, and reference sourcing. Indeed, references no longer need to be found - they can be created.🖤

I would like to share the results of my work with AI. This represents the prototype development process for my upcoming project.

#aI #aiart #aiartist #neweraart #art #newart #artstudy #inspiration #artwork #digitalart #3dartist #3d #cyberpunk #aiartcommunity #midjourney #artist #art #techwear #dystopian #futuristic

I'm thrilled to share my new YouTube channel with you. 
It's a place where I'll share my insights into the techniques in digital fashion, the power of Unreal Engine, and the artistry of filmmaking. If you're curious about my creative process, make sure to subscribe.
www.youtube.com/@snezhananyc (link in bio⬆️)

#youtubechannel #unrealengine #digitalfashion #digitalart #filmmaking #CG #education #educationalchannel

I'm thrilled to share that we're launching our new service! (Link in bio⬆️)

SNEZHANA.NYC Digital Fashion team is a specialized production studio focused on the intersection of fashion and technology. 
We create digital clothing and metaverse fashion, develop immersive AR/VR clothing experiences, and leverage Unreal Engine to render engaging fashion cinematics and lifelike Metahuman avatars.

We integrate with most existing game development pipelines, producing both high-poly models and textures for cinematics, as well as highly optimized game-ready clothing. 

Our team includes skilled 3D specialists, fashion designers, and patternmakers. We know how -real- physical fashion works, so we translate it into 3D seamlessly. I've witnessed firsthand how we breathe life into digital clothing, making it look and feel just like the real thing. 

#digitalclothing  #digitalservice #digitalfashion #ARVRdesign #AR #VR #3D #unrealengine #CG #metaverse #fashionmetaverse #mocap #future #metahuman

Design Review Opportunity 🤓

Hey everyone! I'm opening up slots for design reviews. Want feedback on your creations?

For those new here, a bit about me: I've been an Art Director for years, trained at Parsons School of Design, showcased at events like MBFW, and collaborated with international IT companies. With a decade of diving deep into the CG and Fashion+Tech worlds, I've been fortunate enough to mentor over 150 students. What's more rewarding is seeing many of them joining global agencies and succeeding on their own.

Here's the exciting part: I'm inviting you to send over your standout fashion+tech or CG art pieces. In return, I'll provide some insightful feedback. Let's identify growth areas, clarify your artistic direction, and strategize for the future. And, of course, exceptional works will get their deserved spotlight and my personal recommendations.

Who's in? Let me know below! Link to form in Bio!

Unveiling the Xsens Mocap Solution👾

Just recently unboxed my Xsens suit from @movellaent , and it’s already one of my favorite tech purchases! It’s a game-changer for character animation.
The excitement is limitless. Now all that remains is to set up the entire technical process🤓 And, of course, the art of acting! The process is fascinating, very different from any other areas in 3D entirely — The true vitality of a character stems not just from the tech but also from an actor’s grasp of the intricate dance between «real» performance and the 3D character’s skeletal movement.

Stay tuned for some intriguing insights we’ve discovered from our mocap journey, especially when channeling those nuanced, subtle emotional experiences of our latest project’s protagonist through body movement 😏
#xsens #mocap #digitalfashion #fashiontech #mocapanimation

Cybernetic Orchid👾🌺

Resilience and transformation are recurring themes in my work. The embodiment of this vision for me is the robotic orchid. A year ago, I curated an AI art study featuring orchids. Now, after a few generations of neural network advancements (how time flies!), I'm excited to present a fresh interpretation.

You can download the curated art collection in high resolution on the website (link in bio) #cyberfashion #fashion #cyborg #cyberpunk

Motion Capture conference by @sense4motion 👾 supported by @yildiz_teknopark , @movellaent , @manusmeta and @optitrack ❤️‍🔥 Featured artists in the video are @caglarkaanketenci and @koraybirand 
It’s all about the latest trends and inventions in motion capture for game development and 3D animation.  #motioncapture #mocap #mocapsuit #3d #3dartist

Lamborghini in Mixed Reality! 🏎

Our latest project at @dev_cgi Lamborghini that morphs right before your eyes!

Mixed Reality is revolutionizing the media landscape. These transformative videos blur lines between the real and digital worlds, captivating audiences. Yet, in the realms of CGI and VFX, precision is key. Every technique and effect should resonate with the story you’re trying to tell. It’s easy to make an exclusively in-game world, but to create a balance between the two realities? 😏 DM if you want this kind of media for your brand.

📹 Video: @dev_samv (DeV VP co-founder)
👾 CGI & Compositing: @gleb.kosh.3d 
🎧Sound design: @barekvary 

#mixedreality #CGI #CG #compositing #vfx #digitalartist #digitalart #cg #visualart #3d #viral #marketing #lamborghini #lambo #mdcommunity #renderzone #howiseedatworld

Crafting Characters in CGI 👾💻

Immersed in the art of character creation, my team and I span various realms. Now I tell about the project types:

Game Development: Here, we design optimized low poly characters that come to life in real-time on your screens. The main character should be the most elaborate, but also requires optimization. The secondary character can be simplified. 

Entertainment and Media: Characters for film and cinematics, we craft pre-animated, high poly marvels. These characters prioritize crisp detail and lifelike realism. For projects like this, we often use Metahuman.

Visual Representation: Fast-growing category. From high poly social media influencers that rival real-life personas to Vtube avatars designed for interactive streaming

#CGI #GameDev #Cinematics #digitalinfluencer #vtuber #CharacterDesign #3d #3dartist #3dcharacter #3dmotiongraphics #3dcharacterdesign

When you discover motion capture👾

Mocap captures intricate human movements, revolutionizing animation processes. This type of animation allows you to achieve complex and realistic character animations. You can use mocap in your cinematics, game dev and digital fashion projects.

I'd be happy to create custom animation for you🤺.

💃head of digital fashion team
